title: Fifth Third Bank - Financial Well for Young Adults
description: Imagine empowering young adults to take control of their financial future with confidence and ease. Your challenge is to develop an innovative financial planning solution tailored to their unique needs. It could help users set and achieve their financial goals, track their progress, receive personalized advice, or <insert your idea here>! Let's create a solution that is an engaging and accessible experience that allows your creativity to shine!

title: Kinetic Vision - API Integration
description: Build a web application that plugs into existing APIs from one-or-more external tools to create a novel user experience!

title: Medpace - Improve Medical Research Challenge
description: Best digital solution to improve the clinical trial process. Your challenge is to create a solution to improve or add value to the clinical trial process. More information can be found here!
